main.name: Renjith Chandrasekhar

main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to receive further details

resume.skillmessage: A JavaScript / React developer who is able to build responsive mobile-friendly websites and applications from scratch or work with a team

projects.title: Covid Live Tracker
projects.category: CORONA Live Tracker (Javascript, Firebase, ReactJS, NodeJS)

testimonials.text: Hey Renjith! You've been doing a great job . You're so talented at staying flexible on any project, which helps everyone on the team. You have grown so much in your role since starting here. Thank you for your hard work, and let me know if there is anything I can do to make working here better.

Renjith must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
